subject: Football (College)
Sugar Bowl
lead_paragraph: The No. 11 Sooners, who declined to announce their quarterback before the game, got a Sugar Bowl-record 32 completions from the freshman Trevor Knight in a win over the No. 3 Crimson Tide.
snippet: The No. 11 Sooners, who declined to announce their quarterback before the game, got a Sugar Bowl-record 32 completions from the freshman Trevor Knight in a win over the No. 3 Crimson Tide.
